channel.title: Homes on Sadlil's
channel.description: Recent content in Homes on Sadlil's

item.description:
In few words I am - Full time Software Engineer, In Need DevOps/SysOps. Hobbyist Photographer. Loves to solves problems. Egar to learn new Technologies and plays with them. Loves to read, travel and took photographs.
I have been writing codes full time in Golang from 2015. Sometimes also use other languages like C, C++, Java, PHP and Javascript. Instead of HTTP REST I like to work with gRPC Now.

item.title: Experiences
item.description: Software Engineer, Backend Grab, Singapore. Dec 2017 â€“ Present Full Time Go gRPC MySQL PgSql Presto Grab is more than just the leading ride-hailing and mobile payments app in Southeast Asia. We use data and technology to improve everything from transportation to payments and logistics across a region of more than 620 million people. Working with governments, drivers, passengers, and charities, we aim to unlock the true potential of the region by solving problems that hinder progress.

item.title: Skills

item.title: Achievements
item.description: 2018 Started Building gophersbd/ormpb - golang orm implementation based on protobuf - gophersbd/ormpb Learned How to ride a Bicycle 2017 Joined Grab as a Software Engineer Moved to Singapore Contributed In kubernetes/helm - Expose tiller server metrics to prometheus Contributed in Kubernetes - Resolved Reverse DNS records for named headless services - Use updated DNS in cluster Building Voyager - Secure Kubernetes Ingress Controller by AppsCode
